\documentclass[pdftex,10pt,b5paper,twoside]{book}
\usepackage[lmargin=25mm,rmargin=25mm,tmargin=27mm,bmargin=30mm]{geometry}

\input{docsetup.tex}
\usepackage{subcaption}
\usepackage{pdfpages}
\usepackage{lmodern}
\graphicspath{ {fig/} } 

\begin{document}

%% PART 1
%%The title page will be automatically generated and added by the DAIM system

%% PART 2
\input{chapters/abstract.tex}		%% Optional
\input{chapters/acknowledgements.tex}		%% Optional
\input{list.tex}			%% Generate TOC, list of tables, and list of figures automatically

\cleardoublepage

\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\chaptermark}[1]{\markboth{\chaptername\ \thechapter.\ #1}{}}
\renewcommand{\sectionmark}[1]{\markright{\thesection\ #1}}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.1ex}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.1ex}
\fancyfoot[LE,RO]{\thepage}
\fancyhead[LE]{\leftmark}
\fancyhead[RO]{\rightmark}
\fancypagestyle{plain}{\fancyhf{}\fancyfoot[LE,RO]{\thepage}\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0ex}}

\pagenumbering{arabic} 				
\setcounter{page}{1}

%% PART 3 -- The Chapters
\input{chapters/chapter1.tex}		%% Edit each chapter
\input{chapters/ch2_relatedwork.tex}
\input{chapters/chapter3.tex}
\input{chapters/chapter4.tex}
\input{chapters/chapter5.tex}
\input{chapters/chapter6.tex}

%% PART 4
\input{references.tex}	%% Edit your references in "mylib.bib"
\input{chapters/appendix.tex}		%% Optional

\end{document}
